text: Kafiron kay ghol kay ghol jahannum ki taraf hankaye jayen gay jab woh uss kay pass phonch jayen gay uss kay darwazay unn kay liye khol diye jayen gay aur wahan kay nigehbaan unn say sawal keren gay kay kiya tumharay pass tum mein say rasool nahi aaye thay? Jo tum per tumharay rab ki aayaten parhtay thay aur tumhen uss din ki mulaqat say daratay thay? Yeh jawab den gay kay haan durust hai lekin azab ka hukum kafiron per sabit hogaya
